\section{Module hal.ml.utils.matrix}

    \label{hal:ml:utils:matrix}
\begin{alltt}
Functions to deal with matrices. 
\end{alltt}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{precision}(\textit{matrix})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}
Calcualtes accuarcy on database

:param matrix: 2x2 matrix that looks like
True Positive  - False Negative
     {\textbar}         -       {\textbar}
False Positive - True Negative
\end{alltt}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_column\_of\_matrix}(\textit{column\_index}, \textit{matrix})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param column\_index: int {\textgreater}= 0
    Column index to take
:param matrix: [] of []
    Matrix
:return: []
    Column of array at position given
\end{alltt}

    \label{hal:ml:utils:matrix:get_subset_of_matrix}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.utils \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.utils.matrix \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.utils.matrix.get\_subset\_of\_matrix \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_subset\_of\_matrix}(\textit{headers\_to\_sample}, \textit{all\_headers}, \textit{data})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param headers\_to\_sample: [] of str
    List of columns to get
:param all\_headers: [] of str
    List of all headers in matrix
:param data: [] of []
    Matrix of float values
:return: [] of []
    Correlation matrix of selected columns
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:ml:utils:matrix:remove_column_from_matrix}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.utils \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.utils.matrix \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.utils.matrix.remove\_column\_from\_matrix \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{remove\_column\_from\_matrix}(\textit{headers}, \textit{header\_to\_remove}, \textit{data})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param headers: [] of str
    Column names
:param header\_to\_remove: str
    Name of column to remove
:param data: matrix ([] of [])
    Data
:return: headers, data
    Headers without header removed and data without column removed
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:ml:utils:matrix:add_columns_to_matrix}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.utils \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.utils.matrix \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.utils.matrix.add\_columns\_to\_matrix \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{add\_columns\_to\_matrix}(\textit{headers}, \textit{data}, \textit{new\_headers}, \textit{new\_columns})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param headers: headers: [] of str
    Column names
:param data: matrix ([] of [])
    Data
:param new\_headers: [] of str
    Names of new columns
:param new\_columns: ([] of [])
    New columns to add
:return: headers, data
    New headers (with new headers) and data with new columns
\end{alltt}
